Mitali Haldankar \n
Aniruddha Khandekar \n
Celestyn Kinny

Option: DEC (Decimal) \n
Type - Input & Output \n
Option to set input format to simple positive integers or to convert any input format to simple positive integers

Option: HEX (Hexadecimal) \n
Type - Input & Output \n
Option to set input format to base 16 or to convert any input format to base 16

Option: OCT (Octal) \n
Type - Input & Output \n
Option to set input format to base 8 or to convert any input format to base 8

Option: BIN (Binary) \n
Type - Input & Output \n
Option to set input format to base 2 or to convert any input format to base 2

Option: ROM (Roman) \n
Type - Only Output \n
Option to convert any input format to it's corresponding roman numeral
